block.p: Sally-Beth Kruteck and Andrew David Siegel were married on Thursday by Rabbi Kenneth A. Stern at the Park Avenue Synagogue in New York.

Ms. Kruteck, 36, will keep her name. She is the director of public relations for IT USA, a fashion company that represents such designers as Romeo Gigli and Roberto Cavalli. She received an associate's degree from the Fashion Institute of Technology. She is the daughter of the late Sylvia M. Chatfield and the late Laurence R. Kruteck, and the stepdaughter of Craig D. Chatfield of Darien, Conn.
